about.title: About
about.subtitle: Me
about.heading: Passionate Fullstack Developer
about.p1: I'm a Fullstack Developer with over 3 years of experience building modern web applications using React, Next.js, and NestJS. I love writing clean, scalable code and creating seamless user experiences.
about.p2: During my career, I have worked on both frontend and backend projects, collaborating with designers and developers to deliver high-quality products. I'm passionate about learning new technologies and improving processes in every project I work on.
about.card1_desc: I build responsive websites and web applications using modern technologies, with a strong focus on UX and performance.
about.card2_desc: I work effectively in teams, participate in code reviews, help optimize workflows, and contribute to building high-quality products together.
about.card3_desc: I create intuitive interfaces and smooth user interactions, focusing on usability and accessibility.

works.title: Featured
works.subtitle: Works
works.description: Here are some of my key projects, showcasing my skills in React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript. You can explore trending apps, web tools, and personal projects I built for learning and practice.

on-air-movies.description: A movie and TV show website using TheMovieDB API. Users can browse trending movies and series, search for films, shows, and actors, and view details about their work.

todo-app.description: A simple Todo application built with Next.js, featuring secure user authentication, task management, and an interactive calendar to organize your tasks efficiently.

mira-shop.description: A small online store built with Next.js and powered by Strapi for content management. Features product browsing, a shopping cart, and secure user authentication.

power-pulse.description: A full-featured fitness and nutrition platform that allows users to track their calorie intake, monitor weight, and create personalized workout programs. Built with Next.js, Nest.js, it provides a seamless and secure experience for managing health and daily activity.

goose-track.description: A todo application with user authentication and built-in time tracking. Developed with React, Redux, Node.js, and styled-components, it helps users manage tasks and monitor their productivity.

organick.description: A single-page landing website for a healthy food store. Built with React, Vite, and TailwindCSS, it showcases a selection of organic products and highlights their benefits.

filmoteka.description: A simple movie application built with JavaScript and Firebase. It features user authentication, movie search, and the ability to add films to a personal library.

web-studio.description: A very simple two-page landing website for a web company. Built with HTML, SASS, and JavaScript, it showcases basic company information and services.
